description: The function unique_name_118 is vulnerable to OS command injection and argument injection. The 'files', 'message', and 'tagName' parameters are directly used in the command line arguments without proper sanitization. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands or arguments, leading to unauthorized actions. The CWEs associated with these vulnerabilities are CWE-78 (Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command), CWE-88 (Argument Injection or Modification), and CWE-89 (Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command).
